sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_bbs_category ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), name varchar2(32 char) not null, text varchar2(32 char) not null, mark number(4) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, lasttopicid char(32), lastpostid char(32), topics number(11) not null, posts number(11) not null, iconclass varchar2(32 char), description varchar2(256 char), oorder number(11) not null, primary key(id), unique (name), unique (parentid, text), unique (oorder) );

create table sf_bbs_topic ( id char(32) not null, categoryid char(32) not null, status number(4) not null, bbstype number(4) not null, askstatus number(4) not null, topic varchar2(128 char) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, posts number(11) not null, recommendation number(11) not null, recommendationdate timestamp, recommendationduration number(11) not null, best number(1) not null, contentmark number(11) not null, lastpostdate timestamp not null, lastuserid char(32), favorites number(11) not null, views number(11) not null, description varchar2(256 char), content clob not null, oorder number(11) not null, primary key(id), unique (oorder) );

create table sf_bbs_post ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), contentid char(32) not null, replyid char(32), replies number(11) not null, votes number(11) not null, bestanswer number(1) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, comment clob not null, primary key(id) );

create table sf_bbs_team ( id char(32) not null, ownerid char(32) not null, role varchar2(32 char), createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, description varchar2(256 char), primary key(id), unique (ownerid, userid, role) );
create table sf_bbs_user ( id char(32) not null, topics number(11) not null, posts number(11) not null, lasttopicid char(32), lastpostid char(32), primary key(id) );

create table sf_bbs_ask_vote ( id char(32) not null, postid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, description varchar2(256 char), primary key(id), unique (postid, userid) );
